Text: O̩ma-mi, fʼo̩la-mi de
fʼuko̩ kʼu te̩ ñw e̩ de kʼe̩ deju,
fʼu ji mʼomo̩wo̩-we̩,
E̩ naka ñw ibe kakini, Uwe̩ chʼọma-ye-mi onobule̩,
kʼama le̩ ki fʼuwe̩ de bʼonobule̩ o̩wo̩ ejaduña te̩,
Todu u nyʼope̩ unyi-mi gʼo̩do̩da,
oñ u li ef ame̩nemo̩,
i alale e̩j o̩na ame̩ru amuna unyi onobule̩ le̩,
e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ adu bulubulu, e̩gba o̩la-ne̩,
E̩ la go, onobule̩ʼka de̩ kpai owñ,
Akekale̩ kpai agbo̩go̩ i che,
e̩gbaʼka i dʼej o̩na, e̩gbaʼka i dʼoju-kpologu,
Abe̩le̩ i fʼe̩ne̩ le̩ mu, oñ i dʼalu kʼo̩ alu,
Iche̩bo̩ e̩wñ ure̩do̩ jʼugbo mi,
todule̩ oñ u dufu wa ale dʼuwe̩-i,
U fʼukpo e̩kina ku ma hi reju Ijipti,
u fu mur kpai alos kpai sinimon,
Lewa, kʼa che kʼe̩fu-wa ki ko̩ ñw ufe̩do̩ gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩;
Todu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩-mi dʼunyi n;
i mʼalita oko-wñ du le;
Uko̩la e̩rinyo̩ kʼonobule̩ ka ololo le̩ je̩ ñw u je̩;
Achigili i kwotʼo̩ ubi,
gbogbo tak o̩fa ki legu o̩do̩-wñ du;
Todule̩ amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, me̩ nedrʼo̩la-mi fai ke,
E̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩do̩-we̩ ki hi tʼo̩na e-wñ n,
todu abo kʼi che ma agbe tak i hi uma tinyo̩ chewewe;
Unyi-wñ chʼo̩na o̩jegu,
